metadata.title: CVE-2022-26563 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Tildeslash Monit before 5.31.0, allows remoteattackers to gain escilated privlidges due to improper PAM-authorization.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26563` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

monit - 1:5.33.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: monit package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.33.0-1').
